metadata.Name: Calliar
metadata.Description: Calliar is an online handwritten dataset for Arabic calligraphy.
metadata.Paper Title: Calliar: An Online Handwritten Dataset for Arabic Calligraphy
metadata.Abstract: Arabic calligraphy is a highly artistic and complex skill that has been practiced for centuries. However, the lack of publicly available datasets has hindered the development of machine learning models for Arabic calligraphy recognition and generation. In this paper, we introduce Calliar, a new online handwritten dataset for Arabic calligraphy. Calliar consists of 1000 images of Arabic calligraphy written by 20 different calligraphers. The dataset is diverse in terms of calligraphy styles, pen types, and paper types. We provide a detailed analysis of the dataset and demonstrate its potential for various applications, such as calligraphy recognition, calligraphy generation, and calligraphy style transfer. We believe that Calliar will serve as a valuable resource for the research community and contribute to the advancement of Arabic calligraphy-related technologies.
